question: Carl was a pen pal with 13 people. He stopped being penpals with 3 of them. They each send 3 letters a week that are 7 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 6 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Carl is penpals with 13-3=<<13-3=10>>10 people
Thus he gets 10*3=<<10*3=30>>30 letters a week
So he writes 30*7=<<30*7=210>>210 pages a week
So he writes for 210*6=<<210*6=1260>>1260 minutes a week
So he writes 1260/60=<<1260/60=21>>21 hours a week
#### 21
